description: For a given maintenance window execution, lists the tasks that were run.

parameters.name: WindowExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution whose task executions should be retrieved.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Optional filters used to scope down the returned tasks. The supported filter key is STATUS with the corresponding values PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCESS, FAILED, TIMED_OUT, CANCELLING, and CANCELLED. (dict) --- Filter used in the request. Supported filter keys depend on the API operation that includes the filter. API operations that use MaintenanceWindowFilter> include the following: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocations DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks DescribeMaintenanceWindows DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks Key (string) --- The name of the filter. Values (list) --- The filter values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: WindowExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution that ran the task.

nested_items.name: TaskExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the specific task execution in the maintenance window execution.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the task execution.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: The details explaining the status of the task execution. Not available for all status values.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time the task execution started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time the task execution finished.

nested_items.name: TaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task that ran.

nested_items.name: TaskType
nested_items.description: The type of task that ran.

nested_items.name: AlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm applied to your maintenance window task.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TriggeredAlarms
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch alarm that was invoked by the maintenance window task.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is empty.
